backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types, storage maps, access control, and user/product/order/cart logic initialization. Many methods are declared but truncated.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA‑related features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend React, hooks, and component files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry enabling PWA manifest, service worker registration, cache‑control headers, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and installability settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback HTML page with styling and basic offline feature info.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache management, offline fallback, and network-first fetch handling.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, routes, setup steps, and PWA behavior of the BISAULI store.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for customer, admin, and vendor pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Admin dialog for adding or editing a category with image upload, validation, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Admin dialog for creating or updating products with form fields, image upload, validation, and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin interface for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/category/Categor: Image component that displays a category image with a fallback placeholder on error.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Renders a looping carousel of static homepage banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays categories in a responsive grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper including header, footer, offline banner, and PWA install prompt.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, vendor login link, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation, search, user actions, cart count, theming, and language options.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Reusable loading skeleton components for product cards, grids, categories, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Product card with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Product image component with fallback placeholder logic on load error.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSInstallP: Conditional Add‑to‑Home‑Screen prompt supporting iOS and standard install flows.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Shows an alert banner when the user is offline, based on browser online status.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Vendor dashboard for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with error handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Dialog component for adding or editing vendor products, handling form state, validation, and image uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Mutation hook to place an order and invalidate related cache entries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines centralized React Query cache keys for products, orders, categories, and other entities.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin hooks for fetching and mutating products and categories using the admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Runs periodic health checks against the admin backend actor and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: Admin hooks for retrieving all orders and updating order status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Hooks to fetch the caller's user role and check if the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks for retrieving and mutating cart and wishlist data with login checks and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Public catalog hooks to fetch products and categories using the standard actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Hook to fetch all available coupons from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Fetches admin dashboard statistics by aggregating order data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching customer orders and individual order details with periodic polling.
Hook to fetch referral user IDs for the currently authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update site settings, enforcing a fixed shop name and caching behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Exposes hooks to check Stripe configuration status and update Stripe settings with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useVendorProd: Supplies CRUD hooks for vendor-owned products using React Query with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Implements Add-to-Home-Screen prompt handling with install detection and dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin actor for unrestricted admin operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the document title, defaulting to 'BISAULI' when none is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including login, logout, state management, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to expose theme state, setter, and dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Defines a simple English/Hindi translation system with context, state, and lookup support.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting categories with backend error handling and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Displays coupon count and loading state using a simple management card.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows dashboard stats including orders, revenue, and products with refresh and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides admin layout with sidebar navigation and backend health status indicator.
Static page explaining open admin access and linking to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists orders with status updates, loading/error states, and retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product list with search, sorting, create/edit/delete dialogs, and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page to load, preview, validate, and upload a shop logo, then save updated site settings.
Placeholder admin users page displaying a basic card stating that user management is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, handles quantity updates, calculates subtotal, and shows login or empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the product catalog with filters, sorting, category selection, and URL-synced search parameters.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Provides checkout form validation, displays cart summary, and submits orders after validating shipping details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage sections including banners, categories, and featured products with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and navigation options after a successful order.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Lists a customer's orders with status badges, handling login, loading, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, totals, and status.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment success message with navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info, stock status, and actions to add to cart or wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page for managing saved addresses, indicating the feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile layout with navigation tabs for overview, addresses, and settings, requiring user authentication.
Provides UI to change theme mode and language preferences.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorPage.tsx: Vendor portal handling authentication and showing the vendor dashboard or login screen accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user's wishlist, handles loading and empty states, and lists saved products.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Utility functions to detect backend unavailability patterns and generate user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Utility mapping order status enums to labels, colors, and providing the list of available statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, priorities, architectural notes, known issues, and required assets for ongoing development and deployment.
